short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to automate tasks related to the specific webpages, such as opening links, downloading PDFs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension enhances the functionality of a specific webpage, 'https://oilandwear.com/oil_logic'.

When the extension is installed, it sets a badge text to 'OFF'.

When the extension badge is turned to 'ON', it retrieves links matching a specific pattern on the target webpage and opens new tabs for these links with a delay between each tab creation.

It monitors changes in the status of open tabs. When a tab finishes loading and its URL ends with '.pdf', it triggers a download of the PDF and then closes the tab.

Overall, this extension automates tasks related to specific webpages, such as opening links and downloading PDFs.
